text:
Oh, hey! Hello! Hi! I am waiting for a bus.
Oh, look, here it comes now.

The 
wheels on the bus go round and round, round
and round, round and round.

The wheels on the bus go round and round,
all day long.

The wipers on the bus go swish, swish, swish,
swish, swish, swish, swish, swish, swish.

The wipers on the bus go swish, swish, swish,
all day long.

The doors on the bus they open and shut, open
and shut, open and shut.

The doors on the bus they open and shut, all
day long.

The horn on the bus goes beep, beep, beep,
beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep.

The horn on the bus goes beep, beep, beep,
all day long.
